sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-navbar toggleable="md" type="light" variant="dark">
    <b-navbar-brand id="home" href="#" @click="setCurrentChallenge('')">
      VAST Challenge 2022
    </b-navbar-brand>
    <b-navbar-toggle target="navbarNav"></b-navbar-toggle>
    <b-collapse id="navbarNav" is-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto">
        <b-nav-item class="nav-item" @click="setCurrentChallenge('Challenge2')">
          Challenge 2
        </b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item class="nav-item" @click="setCurrentChallenge('Challenge3')">
          Challenge 3
        </b-nav-item>
      </b-navbar-nav>
    </b-collapse>
  </b-navbar>
</template>


<script>
  export default {
    // eslint-disable-next-line vue/multi-word-component-names
    name: 'Header',
    methods: {
      setCurrentChallenge(challenge) {
        this.$emit('challenge-selected', challenge);
      },
    },
  };
</script>

<style>
  nav {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }

  #home {
    color: #f8f8f8;
    font-weight: lighter;
  }

  .nav-item {
    color: #f8f8f8;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    transition: opacity 0.3s;
  }

  .nav-item:hover {
    opacity: 0.7;
  }

  .c2 {
    background-color: #8ecae6;
    border-radius: 20px;
    margin-right: 10px;
    color: #fb8500;
  }

  .c3 {
    background-color: #fb8500;
    border-radius: 20px;
  }
</style>
